title: Theodore Roosevelt
subtitle_html: 26th President of the United States
author: Tom Hartung
card_content_html: The image above of Theodore Roosevelt's personality shows he is very decisive and realistic. It shows he prefers to be logical, but can be quite emotional as well — when the situation or his mood makes him feel like it.
card_first_person_html:
Completing the profile for Theodore Roosevelt was easier than most, because he lived life to the fullest and held nothing back in the process. We can see from this image that he was strongly grounded in the real world and had little interest in abstract ideals.

Images like this are fairly typical of leaders of all types and levels.
